metadata.lecture_topic: Вычисли learning rate decay: η0=0.1, t=5, T=10, linear.

turns.content: Вычисли learning rate decay: η0=0.1, t=5, T=10, linear.

turns.model_response:
Для вычисленияLearning rate decayηE используем формулу:

ηE = η0 / (number of steps) × e^(-η_per_step × E)

η0 = 0.1  
number of steps = T = 10  
η_per_step = η0 / T = 0.1 / 10 = 0.01  
E = 5

ηE = 0.1 / 10 × e^(-0.01 × 5) = 0.01 × e^(-0.05) ≈ 0.01 × 0.95123 ≈ 0.0095123

**Ответ:**

Learning rate decayηE equals approximately **0.0095** (отделивый Learning rate decayηafter5 epochsequalsabout0.0095).
